page.title: 10SHOPPING
page.content: 186 households use the village shop. Many of these draw their pension or family allowance at this shop/P.O. because it is convenient. 11 never use the shop and 5 do so only very occasionally. Most of those who seldom or never use it say the prices are too high but others say that the commodities they require are not available there. 173 households use supermarkets and only 16 do not. 175 feel that it is cheaper to travel to shop, even including the cost of transport. 85 households have a milkman call and 45 do not. They get their milk either from the farm or a supermarket.
